root.name: Arthur: The Quest for Excalibur
root.description: The game puts you in the shoes of little Arthur, way before he became the infamous King Arthur. The evil king Lot snatched the great sword excalibur in the middle of night to claim the throne to himself, as the right to rule the people falls into the hands of him who can draw the sword from the stone. Yet, the evil King Lot simply swaps the stone and sword for a replica. As young Arthur, it is your mission to find the stolen sword and uncover the villainous endeavours of King Lot. At your disposal is Merlin, the mighty wizard who not only helps you in your quest, providing helpful hints, but also teaches you some impressive magical tricks.
